content.html: For everyone having collective heart attacks over the Okta breach: Go check the Okta setting to "Give access to Okta Support" and "Give directory debugger access to Okta Support." Make sure those are turned off. I am not an Okta admin. Just passing along what I've got.
content.value:
For everyone having collective heart attacks over the Okta breach:

Go check the Okta setting to "Give access to Okta Support" and "Give directory debugger access to Okta Support." Make sure those are turned off.

I am not an Okta admin. Just passing along what I've got.
